trans-unit.source: This field contains the text of the question.
This field contains the text of the answer.
Configure if some letters should come together in one field. Click here for more details.

You can for every field describe how many letter it should contain. For instance if the first 3 field should contain only one letter and the fourth field should contain 2 letters, then you have to write 1112 into this field. If all fields after the fourth field contain only one letter again, then you can omit this in the mask. If all fields contain only one field, then left the mask empty
If the answer ist weather and you want th in one field then write 1112111 or 1112
Column of the position of the question. If the question is in colomn 3 and row 5 locatet, then you have to enter 3.
Column of the position of the question. If the question is in colomn 3 and row 5 locatet, then you have to enter 5.
Direction for the answser. If the answer should lead from the top of the question to the right, then choose "Top to the right".
